StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_CheckAssignedPrograms]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@ContractID int, @ProgramAssigned bit OUTPUT AS
IF EXISTS (SELECT PROGRAM_AVAILABILITY_ID FROM PROGRAM_AVAILABILITY WHERE CONTRACT_ID = @ContractID) SET @ProgramAssigned = 1 ELSE SET @ProgramAssigned = 0
